mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ABC_JUDGE (JUDGE_SEQ,LOAN_CODE,COMMENTARY,RESULT) VALUES (SEQ_JUDGE.NEXTVAL,#{loanCode},'Enter your estimation',0)
mapper.select: SELECT LOAN.LOAN_CODE LOANCODE,LOAN.EMAIL EMAIL,LOAN.PROGRESS PROGRESS, LOAN.CURRENT_MONEY CURRENTMONEY,LOAN.JOIN_COUNT JOINTCOUNT, LOAN.ROUND ROUND,LOAN.EMPLOY_TYPE EMPLOYTYPE,LOAN.SCALE SCALE, LOAN.SERVE SERVE,LOAN.SALARY SALARY,LOAN.LOAN_TYPE LOANTYPE, LOAN.REPAY_TYPE REPAYTYPE,LOAN.INTEREST_RATE INTERESTRATE, LOAN.LOAN_MONEY LOANMONEY,LOAN.LOAN_DATE LOANDATE, LOAN.REPAY REPAY,LOAN.TITLE TITLE,LOAN.FNAME FNAME, LOAN.INTRO INTRO,LOAN.EXPIRY_DATE EXPIRYDATE,LOAN.REQUEST_DATE REQUESTDATE FROM ABC_LOAN LOAN ORDER BY LOAN.LOAN_CODE DESC

SELECT LOAN_CODE LOANCODE,EMAIL EMAIL,PROGRESS PROGRESS,CURRENT_MONEY CURRENTMONEY, JOIN_COUNT JOINTCOUNT,ROUND ROUND,EMPLOY_TYPE EMPLOYTYPE,SCALE SCALE, SERVE SERVE,SALARY SALARY,LOAN_TYPE LOANTYPE,REPAY_TYPE REPAYTYPE, INTEREST_RATE INTERESTRATE,LOAN_MONEY LOANMONEY,LOAN_DATE LOANDATE, REPAY REPAY,TITLE TITLE,FNAME FNAME,INTRO INTRO,EXPIRY_DATE EXPIRYDATE, REQUEST_DATE REQUESTDATE FROM ABC_LOAN WHERE LOAN_CODE = #{loanCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE ABC_LOAN SET CURRENT_MONEY = CURRENT_MONEY + #{investMoney}, JOIN_COUNT = JOIN_COUNT + 1 WHERE LOAN_CODE = #{loanCode}
mapper.select: SELECT LOAN_CODE LOANCODE,EMAIL EMAIL,PROGRESS PROGRESS,CURRENT_MONEY CURRENTMONEY, JOIN_COUNT JOINTCOUNT,ROUND ROUND,EMPLOY_TYPE EMPLOYTYPE,SCALE SCALE, SERVE SERVE,SALARY SALARY,LOAN_TYPE LOANTYPE,REPAY_TYPE REPAYTYPE, INTEREST_RATE INTERESTRATE,LOAN_MONEY LOANMONEY,LOAN_DATE LOANDATE, REPAY REPAY,TITLE TITLE,FNAME FNAME,INTRO INTRO,EXPIRY_DATE EXPIRYDATE, REQUEST_DATE REQUESTDATE FROM ABC_LOAN WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
SELECT LOAN_CODE FROM ABC_LOAN WHERE PROGRESS IN ('펀딩완료', '상환중') AND EMAIL = #{email}

SELECT LOAN.LOAN_CODE LOANCODE, LOAN.EMAIL EMAIL, LOAN.PROGRESS PROGRESS, LOAN.CURRENT_MONEY CURRENTMONEY, LOAN.JOIN_COUNT JOINTCOUNT, LOAN.ROUND ROUND, LOAN.EMPLOY_TYPE EMPLOYTYPE, LOAN.SCALE SCALE, LOAN.SERVE SERVE, LOAN.SALARY SALARY, LOAN.LOAN_TYPE LOANTYPE, LOAN.REPAY_TYPE REPAYTYPE, LOAN.INTEREST_RATE INTERESTRATE, LOAN.LOAN_MONEY LOANMONEY, LOAN.LOAN_DATE LOANDATE, LOAN.REPAY REPAY, LOAN.TITLE TITLE, LOAN.FNAME FNAME, LOAN.INTRO INTRO, LOAN.EXPIRY_DATE EXPIRYDATE, LOAN.REQUEST_DATE REQUESTDATE FROM ABC_LOAN LOAN, ABC_INVEST INVEST WHERE LOAN.LOAN_CODE = INVEST.LOAN_CODE AND INVEST.EMAIL = #{email} ORDER BY INVEST.INVEST_SEQ DESC
SELECT COUNT(LOAN_CODE) FROM ABC_LOAN WHERE PROGRESS = '상환중' AND LOAN_CODE IN ( SELECT LOAN_CODE FROM ABC_INVEST WHERE EMAIL = #{email} )
